about_the_game:
In the Diner:
- Take Orders: Welcome guests and take their food orders.

- Preparation & Cooking: Manage a hectic kitchen as you prepare and cook a variety of dishes.

- Community Building: Form meaningful relationships with patrons who may offer unique advantages in your dungeon adventures.

In the Dungeon:

- Adventuring Guild: Create parties with your friends, both online and offline.

- Inventory Management: Keep track of your loot and ingredients.

- Character Choices: Choose from four distinct characters, each with unique abilities.

Updates and Progress

Expect Monthly Updates—frequent updates will continue until we secure additional funding.

---

Development Milestones: Demo Ready for Milestone 3

- Diner-Dungeon Symbiosis: Achieve seamless interaction between Diner and Dungeon gameplay. (~70% Completed)


- Adventuring Guild: Functionalities for creating parties online and offline. (Completed)


- Inventory System: (Completed)

- Audio Experience: Sound and music implementation is in progress. (~30% Completed)

- Playable Characters: Four unique characters are nearly complete. (~90% Completed)


- Progression Mechanics:

- Stats

- Ability Upgrades

- Item Upgrades

- Character Levels

- General Store: A one-stop-shop to upgrade, buy, and sell goods.

- Menu Settings: In Progress
detailed_description:
In the Diner:
- Take Orders: Welcome guests and take their food orders.

- Preparation & Cooking: Manage a hectic kitchen as you prepare and cook a variety of dishes.

- Community Building: Form meaningful relationships with patrons who may offer unique advantages in your dungeon adventures.

In the Dungeon:

- Character Choices: Choose from four distinct characters, each with unique abilities.

Expect Monthly Updates—frequent updates will continue until we secure additional funding.

name: Dungeons and Diners
short_description: Dungeon and Diners: A Culinary Adventure Awaits! Dive into dungeons with your friends, hunting for exotic ingredients to bring back to your bustling diner. Choose to team up with up to 4 players or enlist the help of adventurers for both dungeon delving and diner duties.
